verses.verse: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Behold <S%H5782><s%>, I will raise up against Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and against them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Leb <S%H3820><s%> - kamai <S%H6965><s%>, a destroying <S%H7843><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%>.

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> unto Babylon <S%H894><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%>, that shall winnow <S%H2219><s%> her <S%H1238><s%>; and they shall empty her land <S%H776><s%>: for in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H7451><s%> they shall be against her round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Against him that bendeth <S%H1869><s%> let the archer <S%H1869><s%> bend <S%H1869><s%> his bow <S%H7198><s%>, and against him that lifteth himself up <S%H5927><s%> in his coat <S%H5630><s%> of mail <S%H2550><s%>: and spare ye not her young men <S%H970><s%>; destroy ye utterly <S%H2763><s%> all her host <S%H6635><s%>.
And they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> down slain <S%H2491><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>, and thrust through <S%H1856><s%> in her streets <S%H2351><s%>.

For Israel <S%H3478><s%> is not forsaken <S%H488><s%>, nor Judah <S%H3063><s%>, of his God <S%H430><s%>, of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; though their land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of guilt <S%H817><s%> against the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Flee out <S%H5127><s%> of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and save <S%H4422><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his life <S%H5315><s%>; be not cut off <S%H1826><s%> in her iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: for it is the time <S%H6256><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s vengeance <S%H5360><s%>; he will render <S%H7999><s%> unto her a recompense <S%H1576><s%>.

Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath been a golden <S%H2091><s%> cup <S%H3563><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>, that made all the earth <S%H776><s%> drunken <S%H7937><s%>: the nations <S%H1471><s%> have drunk <S%H8354><s%> of her wine <S%H3196><s%>; therefore the nations <S%H1471><s%> are mad <S%H1984><s%>.

Babylon <S%H894><s%> is suddenly <S%H6597><s%> fallen <S%H5307><s%> and destroyed <S%H7665><s%>: wail <S%H3213><s%> for her <S%H3947><s%>; take balm <S%H6875><s%> for her pain <S%H4341><s%>, if so be she may be healed <S%H7495><s%>.

We would have healed <S%H7495><s%> Babylon <S%H894><s%>, but she is not healed <S%H7495><s%>: forsake <S%H5800><s%> her <S%H3212><s%>, and let us go every one <S%H376><s%> into his own country <S%H776><s%>; for her judgment <S%H4941><s%> reacheth <S%H5060><s%> unto heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and is lifted up <S%H5375><s%> even to the skies <S%H7834><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath brought forth <S%H3318><s%> our righteousness <S%H6666><s%>: come <S%H935><s%>, and let us declare <S%H5608><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.

Make sharp <S%H1305><s%> the arrows <S%H2671><s%>; hold firm <S%H4390><s%> the shields <S%H7982><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath stirred up <S%H5782><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Medes <S%H4074><s%>; because his purpose <S%H4209><s%> is against Babylon <S%H894><s%>, to destroy <S%H7843><s%> it <S%H5360><s%>: for it is the vengeance of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the vengeance <S%H5360><s%> of his temple <S%H1964><s%>.

Set up <S%H5375><s%> a standard <S%H5251><s%> against the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, make the watch <S%H4929><s%> strong <S%H2388><s%>, set <S%H3559><s%> the watchmen <S%H8104><s%>, prepare <S%H3559><s%> the ambushes <S%H693><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath both purposed <S%H2161><s%> and done <S%H6213><s%> that which he spake <S%H1696><s%> concerning the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

O thou that dwellest <S%H7931><s%> upon many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, abundant <S%H7227><s%> in treasures <S%H214><s%>, thine end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the measure <S%H520><s%> of thy covetousness <S%H1215><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> by himself <S%H5315><s%>, saying <S%H4390><s%>, Surely I will fill thee with men <S%H120><s%>, as with the canker-worm <S%H3218><s%>; and they shall lift up <S%H6030><s%> a shout against thee <S%H1959><s%>.

He hath made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> by his power <S%H3581><s%>, he hath established <S%H3559><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> by his wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and by his understanding <S%H8394><s%> hath he stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>:

when he uttereth <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, there is a tumult <S%H1995><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and he causeth the vapors <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; he maketh <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> for the rain <S%H4306><s%>, and bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasuries <S%H214><s%>.

Every man <S%H120><s%> is become brutish <S%H1197><s%> and is without knowledge <S%H1847><s%>; every goldsmith <S%H6884><s%> is put to shame <S%H3001><s%> by his image <S%H6459><s%>; for his molten image <S%H5262><s%> is falsehood <S%H8267><s%>, and there is no breath in them <S%H7307><s%>.
They are vanity <S%H1892><s%>, a work <S%H4639><s%> of delusion <S%H8595><s%>: in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%> they shall perish <S%H6><s%>.

The portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is not like these <S%H3335><s%>; for he is the former of all things <S%H7626><s%>; and Israel is the tribe of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>.

Thou art my battle-axe <S%H4661><s%> and weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>: and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>; and with thee will I destroy <S%H7843><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>;
and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the horse <S%H5483><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%>;

and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> and him that rideth <S%H7392><s%> therein <S%H5310><s%>; and with thee will I break in pieces man <S%H376><s%> and woman <S%H802><s%>; and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the old <S%H2205><s%> man and the youth <S%H5288><s%>; and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the young man <S%H970><s%> and the virgin <S%H1330><s%>;

and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the shepherd <S%H7462><s%> and his flock <S%H5739><s%>; and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> the husbandman <S%H406><s%> and his yoke of oxen <S%H6776><s%>; and with thee will I break in pieces <S%H5310><s%> governors <S%H6346><s%> and deputies <S%H5461><s%>.

And I will render <S%H7999><s%> unto Babylon <S%H894><s%> and to all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Chaldea <S%H3778><s%> all their evil <S%H7451><s%> that they have done <S%H6213><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Behold <S%H4889><s%>, I am against thee, O destroying mountain <S%H2022><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which destroyest <S%H7843><s%> all the earth <S%H776><s%>; and I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon thee <S%H1556><s%>, and roll thee down from the rocks <S%H5553><s%>, and will make <S%H5414><s%> thee a burnt <S%H8316><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

And they shall not take <S%H3947><s%> of thee a stone <S%H68><s%> for a corner <S%H6438><s%>, nor a stone <S%H68><s%> for foundations <S%H4146><s%>; but thou shalt be desolate <S%H8077><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Set ye up <S%H5375><s%> a standard <S%H5251><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, prepare <S%H6942><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> against her <S%H8085><s%>, call together against her the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Ararat <S%H780><s%>, Minni <S%H4508><s%>, and Ashkenaz <S%H813><s%>: appoint <S%H6485><s%> a marshal <S%H2951><s%> against her <S%H5483><s%>; cause the horses to come up <S%H5927><s%> as the rough <S%H5569><s%> canker-worm <S%H3218><s%>.

Prepare <S%H6942><s%> against her the nations <S%H1471><s%>, the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Medes <S%H4074><s%>, the governors <S%H6346><s%> thereof <S%H5461><s%>, and all the deputies thereof <S%H776><s%>, and all the land of their dominion <S%H4475><s%>.

And the land <S%H776><s%> trembleth <S%H7493><s%> and is in pain <S%H2342><s%>; for the purposes <S%H4284><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> against Babylon <S%H894><s%> do stand <S%H6965><s%>, to make <S%H7760><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> a desolation <S%H8047><s%>, without inhabitant <S%H3427><s%>.

The mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> have forborne <S%H2308><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%>, they remain <S%H3427><s%> in their strongholds <S%H4679><s%>; their might <S%H1369><s%> hath failed <S%H5405><s%>; they are become as women <S%H802><s%>: her dwelling-places <S%H4908><s%> are set on fire <S%H3341><s%>; her bars <S%H1280><s%> are broken <S%H7665><s%>.

One post <S%H7323><s%> shall run <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> another <S%H7323><s%>, and one messenger <S%H5046><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> another <S%H5046><s%>, to show <S%H5046><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> that his city <S%H5892><s%> is taken <S%H3920><s%> on every quarter <S%H7097><s%>:

and the passages <S%H4569><s%> are seized <S%H8610><s%>, and the reeds <S%H98><s%> they have burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> are affrighted <S%H926><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: The daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> is like a threshing-floor <S%H1637><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> when <S%H6256><s%> it is trodden <S%H4592><s%>; yet a little while, and the time <S%H6256><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%> shall come for her <S%H935><s%>.

Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> me <S%H2000><s%>, he hath crushed me <S%H3322><s%>, he hath made me an empty <S%H7385><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>, he hath <S%H8577><s%>, like a monster, swallowed me up <S%H1104><s%>, he hath filled <S%H4390><s%> his maw <S%H3770><s%> with my delicacies <S%H5730><s%>; he hath cast me out <S%H1740><s%>.

The violence <S%H2555><s%> done to me and to my flesh <S%H7607><s%> be upon Babylon <S%H894><s%>, shall the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> say <S%H559><s%>; and <S%H1818><s%>, My blood be upon the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Chaldea <S%H3778><s%>, shall Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> say <S%H559><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Behold <S%H7378><s%>, I will plead thy cause <S%H7379><s%>, and take vengeance <S%H5358><s%> for thee <S%H5360><s%>; and I will dry up <S%H2717><s%> her sea <S%H3220><s%>, and make her fountain <S%H4726><s%> dry <S%H3001><s%>.

And Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall become heaps <S%H1530><s%>, a dwelling-place <S%H4583><s%> for jackals <S%H8577><s%>, an astonishment <S%H8047><s%>, and a hissing <S%H8322><s%>, without inhabitant <S%H3427><s%>.
They shall roar <S%H7580><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> like young lions <S%H3715><s%>; they shall growl <S%H5286><s%> as lions <S%H738><s%>' whelps <S%H1484><s%>.

When they are heated <S%H2527><s%>, I will make <S%H7896><s%> their feast <S%H4960><s%>, and I will make them drunken <S%H7937><s%>, that they may rejoice <S%H5937><s%>, and sleep <S%H3462><s%> a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%>, and not wake <S%H6974><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
I will bring them down <S%H3381><s%> like lambs <S%H3733><s%> to the slaughter <S%H2873><s%>, like rams <S%H352><s%> with he-goats <S%H6260><s%>.

How is Sheshach <S%H8347><s%> taken <S%H3920><s%>! and the praise <S%H8416><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%> seized <S%H8610><s%>! how is Babylon <S%H894><s%> become a desolation <S%H8047><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>!
The sea <S%H3220><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> upon Babylon <S%H894><s%>; she is covered <S%H3680><s%> with the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of the waves thereof <S%H1530><s%>.

Her cities <S%H5892><s%> are become a desolation <S%H8047><s%>, a dry <S%H6723><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, and a desert <S%H6160><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> wherein no man <S%H376><s%> dwelleth <S%H3427><s%>, neither doth any son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> thereby <S%H2004><s%>.

And I will execute judgment <S%H6485><s%> upon Bel <S%H1078><s%> in Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and I will bring forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> that which he hath swallowed up <S%H1105><s%>; and the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall not flow any more unto him <S%H2346><s%>: yea, the wall of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%>.

My people <S%H5971><s%>, go ye out <S%H3318><s%> of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her <S%H4422><s%>, and save yourselves <S%H5315><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> from the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And let not your heart <S%H3824><s%> faint <S%H7401><s%>, neither fear <S%H3372><s%> ye for the tidings <S%H8052><s%> that shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>; for tidings <S%H8052><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> one year <S%H8141><s%>, and after <S%H310><s%> that in another year <S%H8141><s%> shall come tidings <S%H8052><s%>, and violence <S%H2555><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, ruler <S%H4910><s%> against ruler <S%H4910><s%>.

Therefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days come <S%H935><s%>, that I will execute judgment <S%H6485><s%> upon the graven images <S%H6456><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>; and her whole land <S%H776><s%> shall be confounded <S%H954><s%>; and all her slain <S%H2491><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst of her <S%H8432><s%>.

Then the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%>, and all that is therein <S%H7442><s%>, shall sing for joy over Babylon <S%H894><s%>; for the destroyers <S%H7703><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> unto her from the north <S%H6828><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

As <S%H1571><s%> Babylon <S%H894><s%> hath caused the slain <S%H2491><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%>, so at Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> the slain <S%H2491><s%> of all the land <S%H776><s%>.

Ye that have escaped <S%H6405><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, go <S%H1980><s%> ye <S%H5975><s%>, stand not still; remember <S%H2142><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> from afar <S%H7350><s%>, and let Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> into your mind <S%H3824><s%>.

We are confounded <S%H954><s%>, because we have heard <S%H8085><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%>; confusion <S%H3639><s%> hath covered <S%H3680><s%> our faces <S%H6440><s%>: for strangers <S%H2114><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> into the sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the days come <S%H935><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that I will execute judgment <S%H6485><s%> upon her graven images <S%H6456><s%>; and through all her land <S%H776><s%> the wounded <S%H2491><s%> shall groan <S%H602><s%>.

Though Babylon <S%H894><s%> should mount up <S%H5927><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and though she should fortify <S%H1219><s%> the height <S%H4791><s%> of her strength <S%H5797><s%>, yet <S%H227><s%> from me shall destroyers <S%H7703><s%> come <S%H935><s%> unto her <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
The sound <S%H6963><s%> of a cry <S%H2201><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and of great <S%H1419><s%> destruction <S%H7667><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%>!

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> layeth Babylon <S%H894><s%> waste <S%H7703><s%>, and destroyeth <S%H6><s%> out of her the great <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>; and their waves <S%H1530><s%> roar <S%H1993><s%> like many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>; the noise <S%H7588><s%> of their voice <S%H6963><s%> is uttered <S%H5414><s%>:

for the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon her <S%H894><s%>, even upon Babylon, and her mighty men <S%H1368><s%> are taken <S%H3920><s%>, their bows <S%H7198><s%> are broken <S%H2865><s%> in pieces <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah is a God <S%H410><s%> of recompenses <S%H1578><s%>, he will surely <S%H7999><s%> requite <S%H7999><s%>.

And I will make drunk <S%H7937><s%> her princes <S%H8269><s%> and her wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H6346><s%>, her governors and her deputies <S%H5461><s%>, and her mighty men <S%H1368><s%>; and they shall sleep <S%H3462><s%> a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%>, and not wake <S%H6974><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: The broad <S%H7342><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall be utterly <S%H6209><s%> overthrown <S%H6209><s%>, and her high <S%H1364><s%> gates <S%H8179><s%> shall be burned <S%H3341><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>; and the peoples <S%H5971><s%> shall labor <S%H3021><s%> for vanity <S%H7385><s%>, and the nations <S%H3816><s%> for <S%H1767><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>; and they shall be weary <S%H3286><s%>.
